main event: Civilian and three or four others sighted three or four flying saucers over Concord, California on August 5, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting was reported to Travis Flight Service Center., The report was called in by a civilian witness., The sighting occurred at approximately 17:30 local time., There were multiple witnesses to the sighting., The report referenced another incident linked to Operation Little TWIX.
witness description: civilian and three or four others
